attributes.action: Give us, your wage payers a voice & call an election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give the people of the UK a choice. This is a democracy and we have a right to vote. The MP's are our employees, chosen by the people for the people. The people have had enough it's now time for change. We can't wait another year it's time for change now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
